reviews.course_name: Masterpieces of Western Literature and Philosophy (Literature Humanities)
reviews.review_content:
He's a nice guy and seems pretty laid back at first, but don't be fooled; his grading isn't as such.  Not a spectacular professor, yet not completely boring. 
Just another class.
Workload:
Medium, lots of reading like any other Lit Hum class

reviews.course_name: Masterpieces of Western Literature and Philosophy (Literature Humanities)
reviews.review_content: This guy rocks; seek him out.  He's very opinionated, but most of these opinions are pretty accurate.  Very laid-back, informal class tone.
